enWisdom: The most learned among you are the most fearful of you

Wisdom: أَعْلَمُ النَّاسِ بِاللَّهِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ خَشْيَةً لَهُ
enWisdom: The most learned of people about Allah are those who are most fearful of Him
Ask about that which you must know and cannot be excused for being ignorant about
The pinnacle of cognizance is fear [of Allah]

Wisdom: غَايَةُ الْعِلْمِ الْخَوْفُ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The end goal of knowledge is tranquillity and forbearance

Wisdom: إِذَا زَادَ عِلْمُ الرَّجُلِ زَادَ أَدَبُهُ وَتَضَاعَفَتْ خَشْيَتُهُ‏ لِرَبِّهِ
enWisdom: When the knowledge of a person increases, his etiquette improves and his awe for his Lord increases
